idea-plugin.name: LogSensei
idea-plugin.description:
LogSensei helps Java developers write better logging code by detecting missing logs and suggesting appropriate log levels.

Features:
  • Catch blocks — detects empty catch blocks, suggests ERROR level logging
  • Loops — warns about INFO logs in loops, suggests changing to DEBUG
  • Early returns — detects guard clauses without logging, suggests DEBUG level
  • Service methods — ensures @Service methods have entry/exit INFO logs

Smart automation:
  • Automatically adds Lombok annotations (@Slf4j, @Log4j2)
  • Adds missing dependencies to Maven/Gradle
  • Educational tooltips explaining log levels

Supported logging frameworks: SLF4J + Logback, Log4j2, java.util.logging
